chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is experiencing the following issue:
The battery state of my phone received is 84%.
Thank you for your help,

Once the package is received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, they have 2 business days to process your refund (if you are eligible).
A return is considered complete when the customer has fulfilled all the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water
✔ Confirms that personal data deletion has been done
✔ Has confirmed having the return label.
✔ Understands they must include accessories as well as a proof of purchase in their package
✔ Understands they have 14 days to use the return label.
Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, they have 2 business days to process your refund (if you are eligible).

Dear ecomobile,

The customer wants a repair of his device but does not want to remain without a phone.
He therefore offers a discount to allow him to repair his device himself.

So, can you give the customer a discount to repair their device?

Kind regards,

Marlon from Back Market

Dear Backcare, 

Please relay the following message to the customer.

We are sorry for this inconvenience caused. Would you accept a commercial gesture of 50 euros to seek a third-party to repair this issue? this commercial gesture could be used to offset the cost. It also avoids the hassle of deleting all personal data just for a battery repair when returning the phone.

A battery is easy to replace and most shops would be able to do it so you can protect the data within your device instead of a return.

Thank you
Regards,
JH

Good morning,

The customer informs us that the price of the repair is the sum of  
70€, can you offer this to the customer?
 
Also, can you confirm me if the warranty of the device is still vaide after the reperation that the customer will do.

Thank you for your help.

Yours sincerely, 

Estelle
Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

Would the customer be willing to meet in the middle? We are willing to offer a commercial gesture of 60 euros.

Regards,
RK

Hello,

The customer accepts the €60. Please arrange for a partial refund.

Best regards,

Estelle
Back Market Customer Service
